languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "{name}... Когда-то обитатели Кьявы Гамма остались без помощи — и это обернулось трагедией. Когда-то те, кто был призван оберегать Райкад Минорис, допустили ошибку — и Империум потерял целый мир. Фтон IV и его обитатели могут {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}стать следующими{/d}".

{n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "{name}... Когда-то обитатели Кьявы Гамма остались без помощи — и это обернулось трагедией. Когда-то те, кто был призван оберегать Райкад Минорис, допустили ошибку — и Империум потерял целый мир. Фтон IV и его обитатели могут {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}стать следующими{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants could be next."

{n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants could be next."

{n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants could be next."

{n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."

languages.text: {n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“{name}……基亚瓦伽马星的人们遭到抛弃，孤立无援，最终惨遭毒手。那些本该保护小莱卡德的人犯了个错误，最终导致帝国失去了整个世界。菲顿四号星和它的居民很可能会成为{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}下一个牺牲品{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“{name}……基亚瓦伽马星的人们遭到抛弃，孤立无援，最终惨遭毒手。那些本该保护小莱卡德的人犯了个错误，最终导致帝国失去了整个世界。菲顿四号星和它的居民很可能会成为下一个牺牲品。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «{name}... La gente de Kiava Gamma perdió su apoyo y sufrió una tragedia. La gente que debía haber protegido Rykad Minoris cometió un error y el Imperium perdió un mundo entero. Phton IV y sus habitantes {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}podrían ser los siguientes{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} "{name}... La gente de Kiava Gamma perdió su apoyo y sufrió una tragedia. La gente que debía haber protegido Rykad Minoris cometió un error y el Imperium perdió un mundo entero. Phton IV y sus habitantes podrían ser los siguientes».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスが眉をひそめた。{/n}「{name}さん…キアヴァ・ガンマの人々はかつて何の助けもなく取り残され、悲劇に終わりました。ライカド・ミノリスを守るべき人々が間違いを犯し、帝国は全世界を失ったのです。{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}次{/d}はプトン・IVとその住民かもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスが眉をひそめた。{/n}「{name}さん…キアヴァ・ガンマの人々はかつて何の助けもなく取り残され、悲劇に終わりました。ライカド・ミノリスを守るべき人々が間違いを犯し、帝国は全世界を失ったのです。{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}次{/d}はプトン・IVとその住民かもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils.{/n} « {name}... Quand la population de Kiava Gamma a été laissée pour compte, une véritable tragédie s'est ensuivie. Quand les personnes qui devaient protéger Rykad Minoris ont fait une erreur, l'Imperium a perdu un monde tout entier. Phton-IV et ses habitants pourraient {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}être les suivants{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils.{/n} « {name}... Quand la population de Kiava Gamma a été laissée pour compte, une véritable tragédie s'est ensuivie. Quand les personnes qui devaient protéger Rykad Minoris ont fait une erreur, l'Imperium a perdu un monde tout entier. Phton-IV et ses habitants pourraient être les suivants. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "{name} ... Als das Volk von Kiava Gamma keine Hilfe erhielt, war das Resultat eine Tragödie. Die Leute, die Rykad Minoris beschützen sollten, machten einen Fehler, und das Imperium verlor eine ganze Welt. Phton IV und seine Bewohner {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}könnten die Nächsten sein{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "{name} ... Als das Volk von Kiava Gamma keine Hilfe erhielt, war das Resultat eine Tragödie. Die Leute, die Rykad Minoris beschützen sollten, machten einen Fehler, und das Imperium verlor eine ganze Welt. Phton IV und seine Bewohner könnten die Nächsten sein."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "{name}... Kiava Gama'daki insanlara yardım eli uzatılmadı, sonuç trajedi oldu. Rykad Minoris'i koruması gereken insanlar bir hata yaptı, İmparatorluk koca bir dünyayı kaybetti. Sırada Phton IV ve sakinleri {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}olabilir{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "{name}... The people of Kiava Gamma were once left without aid, and that ended in tragedy. The people who should have protected Rykad Minoris made a mistake, and the Imperium lost an entire world. Phton IV and its inhabitants {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}could be next{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "{name}. Kiava Gama'daki insanlara yardım eli uzatılmamıştı ve o süreç trajediyle sonuçlandı. Rykad Minoris'i koruması gereken insanlar bir hata yaptı ve İmparatorluk koca bir dünyayı kaybetti. Sıra Phton IV'te ve orada yaşayanlarda {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}olabilir{/d}."
